reviewText: Watched this and decided to ditch the chemicals. I now save money and time by making all of our cleaning supplies right at home. Every mom should see this doc.
must watch documentary! if you are at all debating buying this to watch it - watch it on Netflix first. I bought this right after to share with family and friends and to educate my community.

This DVD is a must for people to see!  There are so many chemicals in all of the cleaning products most people use, and they don't realize it.  It is an eye-opener!
Look under your kitchen sink, get out your household cleaners and read their ingredients.  This DVD points out extremely well what people are doing to keep themselves and their homes "clean" these days.  An excellent DVD!
